title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 §§ 50-2.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 §§ 50-2.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of this Part is to prescribe the terms and conditions under which authorized insurers may deliver or issue for delivery separate account annuity contracts and separate account funding agreements in this State and the procedures for establishing and maintaining such separate accounts. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
§§
50-2.1

Adopted

New

York State Register August 31, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 35, eff. 8/31/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
